Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In vivo injection of bepridil at a dose of 5 mg / kg ( i . v . ) into 6 anaesthetized dogs which had undergone ablation of all the extrinsic cardiac afferent nerve supply , together with a bilateral medullo - adrenalectomy , caused a marked reduction in heart rate which fell from 98 . 7 + / - 4 . 2 beats / min to 76 + / - 5 . 3 beats / min sustained for more than 45 min .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Anaesthesia |
| Ablation of extrinsic cardiac afferent nerve supply |
| Bilateral medullo-adrenalectomy |

The given paragraph describes an experiment performed on anesthetized dogs. The dogs underwent ablation of their extrinsic cardiac afferent nerve supply and bilateral medullo-adrenalectomy. These procedures are not diseases but medical interventions or treatments. However, the paragraph mentions no specific diseases in it.
